o Order blood for transfusion if there is haemorrhage.
• Give morphine 0.1mg/kg IM if systolic BP≥90 mmHg (maximum dose 10mg)
• Do not remove the placenta if it is still attached to the uterus.
o Give salbutamol 250 μg (½ of a 500 μg ampoule diluted in 20 mL saline) IV to relax the uterus (if no
